name: A Robots Adventures
description:
This is a 2D Platformer Game. In this game a robot has to win the level by squashing or avoiding blob-like enemies which can kill him he only has one life to get 10 coins on each level of the game.

(Note: You need Godots Latest Game Engine to play this Game, Also I don't  recommend playing this game as this is just a prototype, not Final game)

Please download this not so amazing neither interesting game inspiration from bornCG it took me a month to make this amazing game.

All the screenshots are taken from bornCGs Videos, also he made this games tutorial on his channel so thanks to him this is possible.

BornCGs Youtube channel-

Link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdioEctcBLd2nw2aQkl8msw
